statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, pH, temperature, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_data;
SELECT temperature, pH, timestamp, dissolved_oxygen, id FROM environmental_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE dissolved_oxygen < 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND pH < 7.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE dissolved_oxygen > 5 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(pH) AS min_ph FROM environmental_data
SELECT id, pH, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND pH > 7 ORDER BY dissolved_oxygen DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE dissolved_oxygen < 3 OR pH > 8
SELECT * FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC;
SELECT pH, temperature FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE dissolved_oxygen < 5 ORDER BY pH ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT date, time, temperature FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE pH BETWEEN 7.0 AND 8.0;
SELECT * FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, date, time, pH, temperature, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE pH > 7.0 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, temperature, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND dissolved_oxygen > 5.0 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, time, pH, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE dissolved_oxygen < 4.0 OR pH < 6.0 ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%River%' ORDER BY location_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_locations WHERE latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, ph_level FROM environmental_data WHERE ph_level < 6.5;
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, dissolved_oxygen FROM measurements WHERE temperature > 20 AND dissolved_oxygen > 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE ph_level > 7 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE id = 3;
SELECT location, temperature, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND dissolved_oxygen > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM measurements WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, location, ph_level FROM environmental_data WHERE ph_level < 6 AND location LIKE 'River%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, ph_level FROM environmental_monitoring_data
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY elevation DESC
SELECT sensor_name, calibration_date FROM sensor_data WHERE calibration_expiry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT station_name, location_id, sensor_id FROM monitoring_station LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE ph_level > 7.0 AND dissolved_oxygen < 5.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT station_name, sensor_name, calibration_date FROM monitoring_station JOIN sensor_data ON monitoring_station.sensor_id = sensor_data.id
SELECT temperature, ph_level, dissolved_oxygen FROM environmental_monitoring_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT sensor_name, calibration_expiry_date FROM sensor_data WHERE calibration_expiry_date < CURDATE()
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, elevation FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -85.0
SELECT * FROM pH_measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT id, measurement_value FROM temperature_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 25;
SELECT id, station_name FROM monitoring_station WHERE station_name LIKE 'Station%';
SELECT * FROM dissolved_oxygen_measurements WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY latitude, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM pH_measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_time FROM temperature_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 25.0;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_station WHERE station_name LIKE '%Station%' ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM dissolved_oxygen_measurements WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_id, AVG(measurement_value) AS avg_measurement_value FROM pH_measurements GROUP BY location_id HAVING avg_measurement_value > 7.0;
